Wind speed will be (25-35) kmph in the other sea areas around the island.

column2: Wind speed can increase up to (45-50) kmph in the sea areas extending from Chilaw to Galle via Colombo

and from Kankasanthurai to Trincomalee via Mullaittivu.

column2: The sea areas off the coast extending from Chilaw to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar and from
Galle to Pottuvil via Hambantota will be rough at times. The sea areas extending from Chilaw to Galle via

Colombo and from Kankasanthurai to Trincomalee via Mullaittivu will be fairly rough at times.

column2: The wave height may increase about (2.5-3.0) m in the sea areas off the coast extending from Hambantota

Naval and fishing communities are requested to be vigilant in this regard.
Temporarily strong wind gust and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
